alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery County through 515 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Sunnyside, or 26 miles northwest of Green River, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodside. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 264 and 279. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
